mapper.select: SELECT writer, r_name, r_phone, r_do, r_si, r_gu, r_dong, r_cat, r_url, r_id, r_lon, r_lat, c_name, c_phone, c_do, c_si, c_gu, c_dong, c_cat, c_url,c_id, c_lon, c_lat FROM course JOIN cafe ON (cafe_id = c_id) JOIN restaurant ON (rest_id = r_id) WHERE writer = #{u_nick};

SELECT r_name, r_phone, r_do, r_si, r_gu, r_dong, r_cat, r_url, r_id, r_lon, r_lat, c_name, c_phone, c_do, c_si, c_gu, c_dong, c_cat, c_url,c_id, c_lon, c_lat FROM course JOIN cafe ON (cafe_id = c_id) JOIN restaurant ON (rest_id = r_id) WHERE rest_id = #{r_id} AND cafe_id = #{c_id} LIMIT 1;
